data.expected_result: The new window will pop up saying that the app does not have access to your Camera Roll.
data.short_description: You can access Camera Roll despite App telling you that you don’t have permission to view. [iOS 11 and 12 ONLY]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into the iOS settings. - Scroll down to Discord. - Deny access to Photos. - Go back onto Discord - Go to a text channel. - Click on Paperclip - Click on ‘Okay’ when the app tells you that you don’t have access to view your Camera Roll. - Click on Camera Roll. - Observe.
